price: 7. Bekijken zij de aarde dan niet – hoeveel goede soorten Wij daarop hebben laten groeien?
arabic: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ إِلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ كَمۡ أَنۢبَتۡنَا فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ زَوۡجٖ كَرِيمٍ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: awalam yaraw ilā al-arḍi kam anbatnā fīhā min kulli zawjin karīmin
